meanings.definition: In a horrifying or repulsive manner
meanings.sent1: The monster in the movie moved gruesomely through the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: The crime scene was gruesomely depicted in the detective novel.
meanings.sent3: The clown danced gruesomely, trying to be scary but ending up funny.
meanings.sent4: The news of the accident spread gruesomely through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was decorated gruesomely for Halloween.

meanings.sent1: The gruesome scene in the horror movie made everyone cover their eyes.
meanings.sent2: The gruesome details of the crime were hard to listen to.
meanings.sent3: The cafeteria served a gruesome mix of foods that no one wanted to try.
meanings.sent4: The gruesome reality of the situation hit them hard.
meanings.sent5: The gruesome sight of the abandoned house sent shivers down their spines.
